short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hacker Diffuse makes it a bit more challenging to read content on Hacker News.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hacker Diffuse makes it a bit more challenging to read content on Hacker News by adding a slight blur effect to the entire site. Who needs super sharp text? Not you. Train your brain to decipher words and phrases by diffusing the content on the site.
